body: This changes it back to what `set_history` was before this PR. I tried changing it in one of the intermediate commits to not count undefined tensors, but then some tests break. I took that as a sign that it should count undefined tensors.
body_html: This changes it back to what set_history was before this PR. I tried changing it in one of the intermediate commits to not count undefined tensors, but then some tests break. I took that as a sign that it should count undefined tensors.
body_text: This changes it back to what set_history was before this PR. I tried changing it in one of the intermediate commits to not count undefined tensors, but then some tests break. I took that as a sign that it should count undefined tensors.
